app_descript:
App Name: Game Pigeon

App Package Name: game.pigeon.pool

Brief:

Game Pigeon revolutionizes the way you stay connected with friends and family through its diverse collection of engaging games right within iMessage. Whether you're strategizing your next move in Chess, sinking the winning shot in 8-Ball, or enjoying a leisurely game of Mini Golf, Game Pigeon offers something for every type of gamer. Enjoy these games seamlessly in conversation, bringing competition and fun to your regular messaging.
